title: Exor, Ferrari Family Extend Shareholders Pact Governing Carmaker
description: Exor NV and members of the Ferrari family have agreed to extend their shareholders’ agreement for Ferrari NV, as the Italian luxury car-maker develops its first fully-electric model amid broader sector headwinds.
content: Exor NV and members of the Ferrari family have agreed to extend their shareholders’ agreement for Ferrari NV, as the Italian luxury car-maker develops its first fully-electric model amid broader sector headwinds.
